import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { TeamOutlined, HomeOutlined, EnvironmentOutlined, LikeOutlined, TagOutlined, } from "@ant-design/icons"; import "./AdminDashBoard.css"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { getUserListAction } from "../../../redux/Actions/userAction"; import { getRoomAction } from "../../../redux/Actions/userActions"; import { getRoomListAction } from "../../../redux/Actions/roomAction"; export default function AdminDashBoard() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(getUserListAction()); dispatch(getRoomListAction()); }, []); const { userList } = useSelector((state) => state.userReducer); const { dsRoom } = useSelector((state) => state.roomReducer); const { locationList } = useSelector((state) => state.locationReducer); const { valueateList } = useSelector((state) => state.valueateReducer); return (

USERS

{userList.length}

ROOMS

435

LOCATIONS

24

131

TICKETS

1,376
); }
